mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_name, user_pass, user_mail, user_phone, login_type ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userPass}, #{userMail}, #{userPhone}, #{loginType} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_name as userName, user_pass as userPass, user_mail as userMail, user_phone as userPhone, login_type as loginType FROM user WHERE user_mail = #{email} LIMIT 1
